meanings.definition: A claim or right to something
meanings.sent1: I have dibs on the last cookie.
meanings.sent2: She called dibs on the swing at the park.
meanings.sent3: Tommy tried to take my seat, but I had dibs!
meanings.sent4: In the game, he had dibs on being the team captain.
meanings.sent5: Having dibs on the front seat made the car ride more enjoyable.

meanings.sent1: Can I dibs the blue crayon for my drawing?
meanings.sent2: She quickly dibs the best spot for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: I dibs the last slice of pizza before anyone else could.
meanings.sent4: He dibs the role of the hero in the school play.
meanings.sent5: The kids dibs their favorite toys to play with first.
